languages.text: "Вольный Торговец, священный Патент дарует вам множество привилегий. Но это... Лучше бы это было плохой шуткой".

traits.locale_text: "Вольный Торговец, священный Патент дарует вам множество привилегий. Но это... Лучше бы это было плохой шуткой".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Rogue Trader, the sacred Warrant grants you many privileges. But this... I hope it was a tasteless joke, for your own sake."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец, священный Патент дарует вам множество привилегий. Но это... Лучше бы это было плохой шуткой".

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, the sacred Warrant grants you many privileges. But this... I hope it was a tasteless joke, for your own sake."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, the sacred Warrant grants you many privileges. But this... I hope it was a tasteless joke, for your own sake."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, the sacred Warrant grants you many privileges. But this... I hope it was a tasteless joke, for your own sake."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, the sacred Warrant grants you many privileges. But this... I hope it was a tasteless joke, for your own sake."

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, the sacred Warrant grants you many privileges. But this... I hope it was a tasteless joke, for your own sake."

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, the sacred Warrant grants you many privileges. But this... I hope it was a tasteless joke, for your own sake."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “行商浪人，神圣的授状赋予了你很多特权，可这种情况……我只希望这是个不好笑的玩笑，这是为了你好。”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, the sacred Warrant grants you many privileges. But this... I hope it was a tasteless joke, for your own sake."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人，神圣的许可证赋予了你很多特权，可这种情况……我只希望这是个不好笑的玩笑，这是为了你好。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Comerciante Independiente, la sagrada Patente puede concederle muchos privilegios, pero esto... Espero por su propio bien que fuera una broma de mal gusto».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, the sacred Warrant grants you many privileges. But this... I hope it was a tasteless joke, for your own sake."

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante Independiente, la sagrada Patente puede concederle muchos privilegios, pero esto... Espero por su propio bien que fuera una broma de mal gusto».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者よ、神聖な令状はお前に数々の特権を与えている。だがこれは…たちの悪い冗談だろうな、お前のために言っておくぞ」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, the sacred Warrant grants you many privileges. But this... I hope it was a tasteless joke, for your own sake."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者よ、神聖な令状はお前に数々の特権を与えている。だがこれは…たちの悪い冗談だろうな、お前のために言っておくぞ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, la lettre de marque sacrée vous octroie bien des privilèges, mais là... J'espère pour vous que c'était une plaisanterie de mauvais goût. »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, the sacred Warrant grants you many privileges. But this... I hope it was a tasteless joke, for your own sake."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, la lettre de marque sacrée vous octroie bien des privilèges, mais là... J'espère pour vous que c'était une plaisanterie de mauvais goût. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, der heilige Handelsbrief gewährt Euch viele Privilegien. Aber das ... Ich hoffe für Euch, dass das nur ein geschmackloser Witz war."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, the sacred Warrant grants you many privileges. But this... I hope it was a tasteless joke, for your own sake."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, der heilige Handelsbrief gewährt Euch viele Privilegien. Aber das ... Ich hoffe für Euch, dass das nur ein geschmackloser Witz war."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
